        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Parshat Shemot: Why Moshe1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Parshat Shemot: Warum Moshe1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Parshat Shemot : Pourquoi Moshe1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Parshat Shemot: Porque Moshe1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parshat Shemot: Perchè Moshe1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Parshat Shemot: Γιατί Moshe1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Parshat Shemot: Porqué Moshe1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Through text study, learners analyze why Moshe was chosen to lead the Jewish people</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moshe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">leader</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bnei israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">character</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Durch Textstudie analysieren Anfänger, warum 
Moshe beschlossen wurde, um die jüdischen Leute zu führen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Par l'étude des textes, les étudiants analysent 
pourquoi Moshe a été choisi pour mener les personnes juives</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Com o estudo do texto, os learners analisam porque
Moshe foi escolhido conduzir aos povos jewish</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Con lo studio del testo, i principianti analizzano
perchè Moshe è stato scelto per condurre la gente ebrea</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέσω της μελέτης κειμένων, οι αρχάριοι αναλύουν 
γιατί Moshe επιλέχτηκε για να οδηγήσει τους εβραϊκούς 
ανθρώπους</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Con estudio del texto, los principiantes analizan 
porqué Moshe fue elegido para conducir a la gente judía</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">moshe</string>
          </keyword>
